words.definition: To tell someone another person's name so they can meet.
words.arabic_definition: يقول اسم شخص لآخر حتى يتعرفوا على بعض.

example.en: Let me introduce you to my friend.

words.definition: A person you do not know.

example.en: She felt shy talking to strangers.
example.ar: شعرت بالخجل عند التحدث مع الغرباء.

example.en: He is always friendly to new people.
example.ar: هو دائمًا ودود مع الأشخاص الجدد.

words.definition: To greet someone by holding hands and moving them slightly.

example.en: They shook hands when they met.

words.definition: The first opinion you form about someone.
words.arabic_definition: الرأي الأول الذي يتكون عن شخص.

example.en: A smile gives a good first impression.

words.definition: A talk between two or more people.

example.en: They had a short conversation before the meeting.

words.definition: A thing that helps people start a conversation.
words.arabic_definition: شيء يساعد الناس على بدء المحادثة.

example.en: A joke is often used as an icebreaker.
They made small talk about the weather.

words.definition: To give each other phone numbers or emails.
words.arabic_definition: تبادل أرقام الهواتف أو البريد الإلكتروني.

example.en: They exchanged contact after the event.

words.definition: Willing to listen to and accept new ideas or people.
words.arabic_definition: يقبل الأفكار الجديدة أو الناس المختلفين.

example.en: Being open-minded helps in meeting new people.
example.ar: الانفتاح يساعد في التعرف على أشخاص جدد.
